response.explanation: Created a functional CRM dashboard with sidebar navigation, customer grid view, profile view, analytics dashboard, search and filters. Uses localStorage for data persistence with 5 sample customers. All features work: navigation, customer management, search, filtering, and analytics.
suggestions: Implement activity logging for customer actions
Add export functionality for customer data
